title: Reddit News Pro v 7.20 apk
description:
Description
This is the best reddit app out there. The reason i'm uploading this is because the developer was being real jerk to on reddit. Google Play is banned in my country so i politely asked him to share the APK with with me but he refused to me. So i asked my another friend who lives in US to buy this app for me and send the APK. So here i'm sharing the APK of latest version. enjoy the app. I'm pissed from developer but i do thank him for making this great app.


Description
Reddit News is a popular, full-featured app for browsing the websitethe front page of the internet. Whether you're a casual 'lurker', power user, or even a subreddit moderator, Reddit News makes it easy.

Now beautifully enhanced with Google's new Material Design language, Reddit News features excellent readability and effortless navigation.

Just some of the Highlights:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Beautifiul and intuitive interface, inspired by Google's new Material Design language.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Delightful animations throughout enhance the experience.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Stories and comments load at the same time. A simple swipe switches between them.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Inline previewing of pictures, YouTube videos, gifs and imgur's new gifv format. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Advanced comment navigation features. Skip between comment threads, search for words, highlight new comments and more!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Optimized layout for phones and tablets.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Handy tooltips guide you through the app.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Comprehensive Moderator features including distinguish, stickying posts and banning users.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Multiple colour themes including sleek black, fresh blue, pretty pink, and relaxing night mode.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Multiple accounts with full user profile support.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Reply straight from your full-featured Inbox.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Notifications for mail, moderator messages and even your modqueue.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Filter subreddits from your frontpage and r/all
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Spoiler support for all the major subreddits.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Extensive customisation options including font style and size, left-handed viewing and much more.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Color coded comment threads.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Hi-resolution thumbnails.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add Friends funtionality - their comments are highlighted.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Submit links and original content.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Search reddit or individual subreddits.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Subscribe to subreddits or let Reddit News choose one randomly.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Rageface and MLP emoticons (MLP support via PonyMotes app)
